title: Those Key Fragments though
body:
13 unlock chests. 13.... freaken unlocked chests. Dated back to????? fuck I have no idea sometime during season 6?. On a winning streak or... on like 7 of last 9 or something and have gotten 1 fragment. This not my main account so I just ignore it but holy hell if this doesn't show how greedy Riot is at what a true shit system this mastery system is. I do find it funny as I have already spent thousands on your game and know you hate giving out free handouts. Just thought others should know really how 1 sided this shit is.

Kids. Stop freaken out about chests. Its just a system wanting you to spend your hard earned money on skins. They just try to hide it. I guess for those of us who never want to spend money on this game you will get a few free things. But the amount of effort and time to get random items is just hilariously sad.

I am at 14 chests still no key frags. Yawn. I love that people defend this system as if it makes sense. I guess it's possible to get a few free skins a season. But holy hell lt's such a big F you to players who have played this game for a couple years.

And has someone who honored people for years and got nothing in return you think I am super excited to honor people now? Fuck no. People just need to play the game at not be dicks. It easiest enough. Don't see why rewards need to be tied to such a simple concept.
Start getting some honour and play with your team.  You will get key fragments soon enough.

I guess if it makes some kids not rage in game as much so they have a chance to get a joke chest and key then it's a positive but to any adults who have played this game for awhile its just another joke of a system added to the game.
Do you act like this in-game? It might explain your lack of keys. The system rewards you with keys for sportsmanlike behavior now, not for winning.
That's actually the dumbest argument trying to say a company is money hungry about a free system on a free game i've ever seen.
Lucky you. I have 4 keys and no chests.
